meanings.definition: A type of marine gastropod mollusk.
meanings.sent1: The strombus crawled slowly along the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: I found a beautiful strombus shell on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The strombus decided to take a leisurely stroll in the sea.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of strombus shells was a treasure trove of memories.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the strombus made it stand out among the rocks.

meanings.definition: A type of shell from a marine gastropod mollusk.
meanings.sent1: The strombus shell was intricately patterned and delicate.
meanings.sent2: She held the strombus gently, admiring its unique shape.
meanings.sent3: The strombus shell doubled as a tiny home for a hermit crab.
meanings.sent4: The strombus shell whispered secrets of the ocean to those who listened.
meanings.sent5: The child's eyes widened in wonder at the shimmering strombus shell.
